Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-26581 affecting package hyperv-daemons for versions less than 6.6.22.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-26581 affecting package hyperv-daemons for versions less than 6.6.22.1-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package hyperv-daemons is earlier than 6.6.22.1-2, affected by CVE-2024-26581
